name: Building the City {BETA}
description:
NO SAVING SYSTEM, SO YOU MIGHT LOSE PROGRESS

FEEDBACK IS APPRECIATED

Build a city of millions, even billions

WASD to move around

TUTORIAL: 

The two buildings that you see when the actual game starts are for crafting and research. 

The panel on the left is for building, click the icon on the top of the panel to cycle the types of buildings. 

Click the copper bar on the top-right to view your resources.
